values: 资金；基金；专款；储备；财源；经费；投资款；信托基金；公共基金；财务储备；资本储备

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 提供资金；用发行长期债券的方法来收回短期债券
资金筹集人；资金筹集活动

募捐；筹备资金；筹集资金

周转金；周转基金；循环基金

bilingual.source: UNICEF is the United Nations Children's Emergency Fund.
bilingual.target: 联合国儿童基金会是联合国儿童紧急基金。

bilingual.source: The World Wide Fund for Nature wants to protect all animals.
bilingual.target: 世界自然基金会希望保护所有动物。

bilingual.source: She left her savings to a kindergarten and a fund for new doctors.
bilingual.target: 她把积蓄留给了一所幼儿园和一个新医生基金。

bilingual.source: The World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) wants to protect all animals.
bilingual.target: 世界自然基金会（WWF）想要保护所有的动物。

bilingual.source: The World Wildlife Fund is urging people to support their campaign.
bilingual.target: 世界野生动物基金会正在呼吁人们支持他们的活动。
她检查了她的基金仓位。
他们设立了一个奖学金基金。

bilingual.source: We decided to invest in a new fund.
bilingual.target: 我们决定投资一个新的基金。

bilingual.source: This project is funded by a government fund.
bilingual.target: 这个项目由政府基金资助。

yingyinNormal.en: The hedge fund Vonerich. Another DUI. Keeping the world safe for drunk CEOs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗尼里奇对冲基金，又一个酒驾。为喝醉的CEO保驾护航。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no. No. The bank owns our hedge fund, but we're not really part of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是的，对冲基金的所有权属于银行，但是我们并不是银行的一部分。

yingyinNormal.en: So here's the bottom line. We're losing jury members. And the fund managers are getting nervous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是底线了，我们正失去陪审员的支持，基金管理人对此紧张不安。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm worried about the funding. The Disaster Relief Fund has been depleted by a third since you launched AmWorks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很担心资金问题。美就法启动后，联邦应急管理局赈灾基金耗掉了三分之一。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, right, the unemployed piano player who gave his trust fund to charity? I'm splitting the muffin with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是喔，那个把信托基金全捐给慈善机构的失业钢琴师吗？我要回去跟他分那个松饼的。

yingyinNormal.en: This is what the average senior citizen gets, one year from entitlements, whether they were a janitor or they ran a hedge fund.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是国民一年平均从福利项目得到的数额，不管是清洁工，还是对冲基金经理。

yingyinNormal.en: No bank or ratings agency is going to confirm a story like this just because it comes from two guys in a, sorry, garage band hedge fund that thinks it's the apocalypse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 银行和评级机构不会确认这样的消息，就因为两个来自基金开在车库的家伙觉得世界末日要到了。

yingyinNormal.en: The tactic Khorasan uses to fund terrorist activity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是呼罗珊为恐怖主义活动提供资金的固有手段。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the occasion? Just a little fund-raiser for the university.
yingyinNormal.zh: 究竟是什么场合啊？就是本校的几位赞助者。

yingyinNormal.en: First you say you want me to appear at your fund-raisers, but now you say you never want me to go anywhere near your fund-raisers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你一开始说你想要我出席你的筹款会，现在你又说你再也不想让我接近你的筹款会。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, perfect. I've been telling you to go fund yourself for years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好样的，我跟你说了好几年要为自己集资了。

yingyinNormal.en: Apparently, I'm not artsy enough and have too many legs. So now I'm on Go Fund Yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很显然我不够文艺而且我腿太多，所以我投奔"为自己集资"站了。

yingyinNormal.en: The night Russo fell off the wagon, he was at a fund-raiser, the McNeally Cancer Institute.
yingyinNormal.zh: Russo酒瘾复发当晚，他出席了一次募捐活动，McNeally癌症研究所。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm about to meet with the leadership to ask them to replenish the fund, but I can't ask for that much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要去见领导层请他们再批一部分资金，但我不能要求那么多钱。

yingyinNormal.en: Sold it to a Jordanian prince living up there. Trust fund billionaire. Said he wanted it in his supercar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把它卖给住在那里的约旦王子了，亿万富豪，他说他的超跑需要这装置。

yingyinNormal.en: What about a humanitarian relief fund, for your allies in Africa? You can distribute it any way you see fit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人道主义救济金呢，给你在非洲的盟友？可以随意使用。

yingyinNormal.en: The proceeds from the fields helped fund our defenses. And each now pledges their support for an assault on Cambulac.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从土地获得的收入帮助我们建立了自己的武装，他们每一个人都希望为攻陷大都献出一臂之力。

yingyinNormal.en: Hofstadter! Heard Siebert put you in charge of the administrative fund. Can't think of a better guy for the job. I think he's done this before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍夫斯塔德兄！听说塞伯特让你负责管理了行政拨款。真是想不到比你更适合的人选了。我看他应该是马屁老手了。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure. Open up a college fund, shop for life insurance, and in the laundry room, there's a mountain of dirty laundry. Wash it or burn in, your choice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有啊，开个大学学费的账户，去挑人寿保险，然后洗衣房里还有堆积如山的衣服，洗了还是烧了，随你选。

yingyinNormal.en: $2,500 in cash was found in a Manila envelope on Margot's passenger seat. Was it a runaway fund? Like the lead detective is suggesting, or was it something more?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在玛戈的座位底下发现了装着2500美元的信封。这是出逃资金吗？就像警探暗示的一样，还是另有隐情？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 专款; 基金; 资助

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 公共资助研究；公共拨款研究；公共资金资助研究

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无基金的；无公共基金的；短期的；无基金退休金计划的

word_family.mean: n. 基金；专款；资金；财源；大量的贮存

sense_info_list.en: money needed or available to spend on something

examination_example.sentence: Another nationwide concern is whether public <highlight>funds</highlight> from other agencies are going into construction in fire-prone districts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个全国性的担忧是，来自其他机构的公共钱款是否会用于火灾易发地区的建设。

examination_example.sentence: Do we want instead to redirect those <highlight>funds</highlight> to concentrate on lower-hazard parts of the landscape?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，我们是否希望将这些钱款转移到风险较低的领域？

examination_example.sentence: The trick is to direct these <highlight>funds</highlight> better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诀窍在于更好地管理这些钱款。

sense_info_list.zh: 专款; 基金; 资助

examination_example.sentence: Some growth stems from a commitment by governments and farsighted businesses to <highlight>fund</highlight> cleaner energy sources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些增长源于政府和有远见的企业为清洁能源提供资金的承诺。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>fund</highlight> will also be used to compensate landowners who set aside habitat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该基金还将用于补偿那些放弃栖息地的土地所有者。

examination_example.sentence: They do not <highlight>fund</highlight> peer-reviewed research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不资助同行评议的研究。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 专款; 基金; 资助

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 基金；专款；资金；财源；大量的贮存

sense_info_list.zh: 专款; 基金; 资助

examination_example.sentence: Introducing a <highlight>fund</highlight> raising requirement for students does not help, as better off children can tap up richer aunts and neighbour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对学生提出筹集资金并没有什么帮助，因为条件更好的孩子可以与较富裕的阿姨和邻居见面。

examination_example.sentence: Methods such as whole school <highlight>fund</highlight> raising, with the proceeds (收益) pooled, can help to extend opportunities and fuel community spirit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如全校筹集资金并集中收益的方法，可以帮助扩大机会并激发社会精神。

examination_example.sentence: There're currently 21.5 million students in America, and many will be <highlight>funding</highlight> their college on borrowed money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前美国在读学生有2150万，许多人都将要通过贷款来上大学。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Funding</highlight> agencies note that data paid for with public money should be public information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 资助机构指出，用公共资金支付的数据应该是公共信息。

examination_example.sentence: More than $100 billion in <highlight>funding</highlight> has been put on the table for supporting developing nations to reduce emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为支持发展中国家的减排工作，已有1000多亿美金的资金投入。

examination_example.sentence: Securing these <highlight>funds</highlight>, and establishing who is responsible for raising them will also be vital for the future of climate-vulnerable countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保这些资金的安全，并确定谁来负责筹集这些资金，对那些气候敏感国家的未来也至关重要。

examination_example.sentence: There is also very little detail on who will provide the <highlight>funds</highlight> or, importantly, who is responsible for their provision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于谁将提供资金，或者是更重要的，谁负责提供资金的细节也很少。

sense_info_list.en: money needed or available to spend on something

examination_example.sentence: Other rocket enthusiasts also raised <highlight>funds</highlight> for him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他火箭爱好者也为他筹集了资金。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 专款; 基金; 资助

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 基金；专款；资金；财源；大量的贮存

sense_info_list.en: money needed or available to spend on something

examination_example.sentence: Their employer simply will not put up the <highlight>funds</highlight> to buy them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的雇主根本不会拿出资金来购买他们。

examination_example.sentence: Where get the <highlight>funds</highlight> for rebuilding their village.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从哪里获得资金来重建他们的村庄。

examination_example.sentence: To date, his online page to raise <highlight>funds</highlight> has brought in more than $44,000 and counting, raising more than $17,000 in just one day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，他的网上筹款页面已经带来了超过44000美元的收入，并且还在不断增加，仅仅一天就筹集了超过17000美元。

sense_info_list.zh: 专款; 基金; 资助

examination_example.sentence: Crow <highlight>funding</highlight> can be part of researcher's efforts to reach the public, and people give because "they feel a connection to the person" who is doing the fundraising-not necessarily to the science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众筹可以成为研究人员与公众接触的努力的一部分，人们捐款是因为“他们感觉到了与募捐者的联系”，而不一定是与科学有关。

examination_example.sentence: Crowd <highlight>funding</highlight>, raising money for a project through online appeals, has taken off in recent years for everything from making movies to producing water-saving gadgets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，从制作电影到生产节水小工具，通过网络呼吁为一个项目筹集资金的众筹已经在各个领域兴起。

examination_example.sentence: For one, they use a crowd <highlight>funding</highlight> platform that specializes in raising money for science, and not just any kind of project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，他们使用一个专门为科学筹款的众筹平台，而不仅仅是任何种类的项目。

examination_example.sentence: It's expected to raise $410 million over the next five years, most of which will go toward <highlight>funding</highlight> a universal pre-kindergarten program for the city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在未来五年里预计会征收4.1亿美元，其中大部分资金会用于资助该城市的一项普及学前教育项目。

examination_example.sentence: Those are a few of the traits of successful science crowd <highlight>funding</highlight> efforts that emerge from a recent study that examined nearly 400 campaigns, But having a large network and some promotional skis may be more crucial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的一项研究对近400项活动进行了调查，结果显示这些是成功的科学众筹活动的一些特征。但是拥有一个庞大的数据网络和一些推广技巧可能更为重要。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 专款; 基金; 资助

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 专款; 基金; 资助

examination_example.sentence: According to the World Wildlife <highlight>Fund</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据世界野生动物基金会。

examination_example.sentence: About 98 percent of every duck stamp dollar goes directly into the Migratory Bird Conservation <highlight>Fund</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每张鸭票的大约98%直接投入候鸟保护基金。

examination_example.sentence: She chose to sell a few larger objects when we promised to put the money into her school <highlight>fund</highlight> (基金).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们答应把钱存入她的学校基金时，她选择卖掉一些大件物品。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 专款; 基金; 资助

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 专款; 基金; 资助

examination_example.sentence: For passengers who need to change or return their tickets, they can change the tickets or get their <highlight>fund</highlight> (退款) through 12306.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于需要改签或退票的乘客，他们可以通过12306进行改签或退款。

examination_example.sentence: It stands for World Wide <highlight>Fund</highlight> for Nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它代表世界自然基金会。

examination_example.sentence: Ariel had worked at the Wild Bird <highlight>Fund</highlight> rehab center (康复中心) and knew that swans can be aggressive (攻击性的).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾瑞尔曾在野生鸟类基金会康复中心工作，知道天鹅是有攻击性的。

sense_info_list.en: money needed or available to spend on something

examination_example.sentence: From the year of 2002, she began a six-year journey to look for <highlight>funds</highlight> (资金).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从2002年开始，她开始了长达6年的寻找资金之旅。
